name: Card Battle Prototype
description:
This is basically my first godot project (^w^).

Mainly developed through post ldjam of october 2021 to try Godot Engine.

This was supposed to be a rogue-like deckbuilder, but for now it's only a early prototype that allow to play cards in a test battle.

BUG LIST :
-1 The Quit Button on the Menu crash the app in the browser (^w^)

I'll probably continue this project but not now (^^")
